verses.verse: וַיִּקַּ֣ח <S%H3947><s%> took קֹ֔רַח <S%H7141><s%> Now Korah בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son יִצְהָ֥ר <S%H3324><s%> of Izhar בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son קְהָ֖ת <S%H6955><s%> of Kohath בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son לֵוִ֑י <S%H3878><s%> of Levi וְדָתָ֨ן <S%H1885><s%> and Dathan וַאֲבִירָ֜ם <S%H48><s%> and Abiram בְּנֵ֧י <S%H1121><s%> the sons אֱלִיאָ֛ב <S%H446><s%> of Eliab וְא֥וֹן <S%H203><s%> and On בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son פֶּ֖לֶת <S%H6431><s%> of Peleth בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> sons רְאוּבֵֽן׃ <S%H7205><s%> of Reuben

וַיָּקֻ֙מוּ֙ <S%H6965><s%> And they rose up לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> before מֹשֶׁ֔ה <S%H4872><s%> Moses וַאֲנָשִׁ֥ים <S%H582><s%> with certain מִבְּנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel חֲמִשִּׁ֣ים <S%H2572><s%> and fifty וּמָאתָ֑יִם <S%H3967><s%> two hundred נְשִׂיאֵ֥י <S%H5387><s%> princes עֵדָ֛ה <S%H5712><s%> of the assembly קְרִאֵ֥י <S%H7148><s%> famous מוֹעֵ֖ד <S%H4150><s%> in the congregation אַנְשֵׁי־ <S%H582><s%> men שֵֽׁם׃ <S%H8034><s%> of renown

וַיִּֽקָּהֲל֞וּ <S%H6950><s%> And they gathered themselves together עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> against מֹשֶׁ֣ה <S%H4872><s%> against Moses וְעַֽל־ <S%H5921><s%> above אַהֲרֹ֗ן <S%H175><s%> and against Aaron וַיֹּאמְר֣וּ <S%H559><s%> and said אֲלֵהֶם֮ <S%H413><s%> to רַב־ <S%H7227><s%> unto them [Ye take] too much לָכֶם֒ כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> for כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> for all הָֽעֵדָה֙ <S%H5712><s%> upon you seeing all the congregation כֻּלָּ֣ם <S%H3605><s%> every קְדֹשִׁ֔ים <S%H6918><s%> [are] holy וּבְתוֹכָ֖ם <S%H8432><s%> [is] among יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> every one of them and the LORD וּמַדּ֥וּעַ <S%H4069><s%> why תִּֽתְנַשְּׂא֖וּ <S%H5375><s%> them wherefore then lift ye up עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> above קְהַ֥ל <S%H6951><s%> yourselves above the congregation יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> and the LORD
וַיִּשְׁמַ֣ע <S%H8085><s%> heard מֹשֶׁ֔ה <S%H4872><s%> And when Moses וַיִּפֹּ֖ל <S%H5307><s%> [it] he fell עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on פָּנָֽיו׃ <S%H6440><s%> upon his face

וַיְדַבֵּ֨ר <S%H1696><s%> And he spake אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to קֹ֜רַח <S%H7141><s%> unto Korah וְאֶֽל־ <S%H413><s%> and כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all עֲדָתוֹ֮ <S%H5712><s%> and unto all his company לֵאמֹר֒ <S%H559><s%> saying בֹּ֠קֶר <S%H1242><s%> Even to morrow וְיֹדַ֨ע <S%H3045><s%> will shew יְהוָ֧ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> who ל֛וֹ וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַקָּד֖וֹשׁ <S%H6918><s%> who [are] his and [who is] holy וְהִקְרִ֣יב <S%H7126><s%> and will cause [him] to come near אֵלָ֑יו <S%H413><s%> about וְאֵ֛ת <S%H853><s%> אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> whom יִבְחַר־ <S%H977><s%> unto him even [him] whom he hath chosen בּ֖וֹ יַקְרִ֥יב <S%H7126><s%> will he cause to come near אֵלָֽיו׃ <S%H413><s%> about

זֹ֖את <S%H2063><s%> likewise עֲשׂ֑וּ <S%H6213><s%> This do קְחוּ־ <S%H3947><s%> Take לָכֶ֣ם מַחְתּ֔וֹת <S%H4289><s%> you censers קֹ֖רַח <S%H7141><s%> Korah וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all עֲדָתֽוֹ׃ <S%H5712><s%> and all his company

וּתְנ֣וּ <S%H5414><s%> And put בָהֵ֣ן ׀ <S%H2004><s%> therein אֵ֡שׁ <S%H784><s%> fire וְשִׂימוּ֩ <S%H7760><s%> and put עֲלֵיהֶ֨ן <S%H5921><s%> and קְטֹ֜רֶת <S%H7004><s%> incense לִפְנֵ֤י <S%H6440><s%> in them before יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD מָחָ֔ר <S%H4279><s%> to morrow וְהָיָ֗ה <S%H1961><s%> become הָאִ֛ישׁ <S%H376><s%> and it shall be [that] the man אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> whom יִבְחַ֥ר <S%H977><s%> doth choose יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> whom the LORD ה֣וּא <S%H1931><s%> who הַקָּד֑וֹשׁ <S%H6918><s%> he [shall be] holy רַב־ <S%H7227><s%> [ye take] too much לָכֶ֖ם בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> upon you ye sons לֵוִֽי׃ <S%H3878><s%> of Levi

וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said מֹשֶׁ֖ה <S%H4872><s%> And Moses אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to קֹ֑רַח <S%H7141><s%> unto Korah שִׁמְעוּ־ <S%H8085><s%> Hear נָ֖א <S%H4994><s%> now בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> I pray you ye sons לֵוִֽי׃ <S%H3878><s%> of Levi

הַמְעַ֣ט <S%H4592><s%> [Seemeth it but] a small thing מִכֶּ֗ם <S%H4480><s%> at כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for הִבְדִּיל֩ <S%H914><s%> hath separated אֱלֹהֵ֨י <S%H430><s%> unto you that the God יִשְׂרָאֵ֤ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel אֶתְכֶם֙ <S%H853><s%> מֵעֲדַ֣ת <S%H5712><s%> you from the congregation יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel לְהַקְרִ֥יב <S%H7126><s%> to bring you near אֶתְכֶ֖ם <S%H853><s%> אֵלָ֑יו <S%H413><s%> to himself לַעֲבֹ֗ד <S%H5647><s%> to himself to do אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עֲבֹדַת֙ <S%H5656><s%> the service מִשְׁכַּ֣ן <S%H4908><s%> of the tabernacle יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD וְלַעֲמֹ֛ד <S%H5975><s%> and to stand לִפְנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> before הָעֵדָ֖ה <S%H5712><s%> the congregation לְשָׁרְתָֽם׃ <S%H8334><s%> to minister

וַיַּקְרֵב֙ <S%H7126><s%> And he hath brought thee near אֹֽתְךָ֔ <S%H853><s%> וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all אַחֶ֥יךָ <S%H251><s%> [to him] and all thy brethren בְנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> the sons לֵוִ֖י <S%H3878><s%> of Levi אִתָּ֑ךְ <S%H854><s%> for וּבִקַּשְׁתֶּ֖ם <S%H1245><s%> with thee and seek גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> for כְּהֻנָּֽה׃ <S%H3550><s%> ye the priesthood

לָכֵ֗ן <S%H3651><s%> For which cause אַתָּה֙ <S%H859><s%> you וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all עֲדָ֣תְךָ֔ <S%H5712><s%> [both] thou and all thy company הַנֹּעָדִ֖ים <S%H3259><s%> [are] gathered together עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> against יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> against the LORD וְאַהֲרֹ֣ן <S%H175><s%> and what [is] Aaron מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> who ה֔וּא <S%H1931><s%> he כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for [תִלֹּונוּ כ] (תַלִּ֖ינוּ <S%H3885><s%> abide ק) עָלָֽיו׃ <S%H5921><s%> against

וַיִּשְׁלַ֣ח <S%H7971><s%> sent מֹשֶׁ֔ה <S%H4872><s%> And Moses לִקְרֹ֛א <S%H7121><s%> to call לְדָתָ֥ן <S%H1885><s%> Dathan וְלַאֲבִירָ֖ם <S%H48><s%> and Abiram בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> the sons אֱלִיאָ֑ב <S%H446><s%> of Eliab וַיֹּאמְר֖וּ <S%H559><s%> which said לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> We will not נַעֲלֶֽה׃ <S%H5927><s%> We will not come up

הַמְעַ֗ט <S%H4592><s%> [Is it] a small thing כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> that הֶֽעֱלִיתָ֙נוּ֙ <S%H5927><s%> thou hast brought us up מֵאֶ֨רֶץ <S%H776><s%> out of a land זָבַ֤ת <S%H2100><s%> that floweth חָלָב֙ <S%H2461><s%> with milk וּדְבַ֔שׁ <S%H1706><s%> and honey לַהֲמִיתֵ֖נוּ <S%H4191><s%> to kill בַּמִּדְבָּ֑ר <S%H4057><s%> us in the wilderness כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for תִשְׂתָּרֵ֥ר <S%H8323><s%> thyself altogether עָלֵ֖ינוּ <S%H5921><s%> over גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> also הִשְׂתָּרֵֽר׃ <S%H8323><s%> a prince

אַ֡ף <S%H637><s%> Moreover לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> nor אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> into אֶרֶץ֩ <S%H776><s%> us into a land זָבַ֨ת <S%H2100><s%> that floweth חָלָ֤ב <S%H2461><s%> with milk וּדְבַשׁ֙ <S%H1706><s%> and honey הֲבִ֣יאֹתָ֔נוּ <S%H935><s%> thou hast not brought וַתִּ֨תֶּן־ <S%H5414><s%> or given לָ֔נוּ נַחֲלַ֖ת <S%H5159><s%> us inheritance שָׂדֶ֣ה <S%H7704><s%> of fields וָכָ֑רֶם <S%H3754><s%> and vineyards הַעֵינֵ֞י <S%H5869><s%> the eyes הָאֲנָשִׁ֥ים <S%H376><s%> of הָהֵ֛ם <S%H1992><s%> these תְּנַקֵּ֖ר <S%H5365><s%> wilt thou put out לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> nor נַעֲלֶֽה׃ <S%H5927><s%> arise

וַיִּ֤חַר <S%H2734><s%> wroth לְמֹשֶׁה֙ <S%H4872><s%> And Moses מְאֹ֔ד <S%H3966><s%> was very וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <S%H559><s%> and said אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תֵּ֖פֶן <S%H6437><s%> Respect אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about מִנְחָתָ֑ם <S%H4503><s%> not thou their offering לֹ֠א <S%H3808><s%> nor חֲמ֨וֹר <S%H2543><s%> ass אֶחָ֤ד <S%H259><s%> one מֵהֶם֙ <S%H1992><s%> like נָשָׂ֔אתִי <S%H5375><s%> I have not taken וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> nor הֲרֵעֹ֖תִי <S%H7489><s%> from them neither have I hurt אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אַחַ֥ד <S%H259><s%> one מֵהֶֽם׃ <S%H1992><s%> like

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said מֹשֶׁה֙ <S%H4872><s%> And Moses אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to קֹ֔רַח <S%H7141><s%> unto Korah אַתָּה֙ <S%H859><s%> You וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all עֲדָ֣תְךָ֔ <S%H5712><s%> Be thou and all thy company הֱי֖וּ <S%H1961><s%> be present לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> before יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אַתָּ֥ה <S%H859><s%> you וָהֵ֛ם <S%H1992><s%> with וְאַהֲרֹ֖ן <S%H175><s%> thou and they and Aaron מָחָֽר׃ <S%H4279><s%> to morrow

וּקְח֣וּ ׀ <S%H3947><s%> And take אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> every man מַחְתָּת֗וֹ <S%H4289><s%> his censer וּנְתַתֶּ֤ם <S%H5414><s%> and put עֲלֵיהֶם֙ <S%H5921><s%> and קְטֹ֔רֶת <S%H7004><s%> incense וְהִקְרַבְתֶּ֞ם <S%H7126><s%> in them and bring לִפְנֵ֤י <S%H6440><s%> ye before יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> every man מַחְתָּת֔וֹ <S%H4289><s%> his censer חֲמִשִּׁ֥ים <S%H2572><s%> and fifty וּמָאתַ֖יִם <S%H3967><s%> two hundred מַחְתֹּ֑ת <S%H4289><s%> censers וְאַתָּ֥ה <S%H859><s%> you וְאַהֲרֹ֖ן <S%H175><s%> thou also and Aaron אִ֥ישׁ <S%H376><s%> each מַחְתָּתֽוֹ׃ <S%H4289><s%> [of you] his censer

וַיִּקְח֞וּ <S%H3947><s%> And they took אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> every man מַחְתָּת֗וֹ <S%H4289><s%> his censer וַיִּתְּנ֤וּ <S%H5414><s%> and put עֲלֵיהֶם֙ <S%H5921><s%> and אֵ֔שׁ <S%H784><s%> fire וַיָּשִׂ֥ימוּ <S%H7760><s%> in them and laid עֲלֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H5921><s%> and קְטֹ֑רֶת <S%H7004><s%> incense וַֽיַּעַמְד֗וּ <S%H5975><s%> thereon and stood פֶּ֛תַח <S%H6607><s%> in the door אֹ֥הֶל <S%H168><s%> of the tabernacle מוֹעֵ֖ד <S%H4150><s%> of the congregation וּמֹשֶׁ֥ה <S%H4872><s%> with Moses וְאַהֲרֹֽן׃ <S%H175><s%> and Aaron

וַיַּקְהֵ֨ל <S%H6950><s%> gathered עֲלֵיהֶ֥ם <S%H5921><s%> against קֹ֙רַח֙ <S%H7141><s%> And Korah אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הָ֣עֵדָ֔ה <S%H5712><s%> all the congregation אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> at פֶּ֖תַח <S%H6607><s%> against them unto the door אֹ֣הֶל <S%H168><s%> of the tabernacle מוֹעֵ֑ד <S%H4150><s%> of the congregation וַיֵּרָ֥א <S%H7200><s%> appeared כְבוֹד־ <S%H3519><s%> and the glory יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הָעֵדָֽה׃ <S%H5712><s%> unto all the congregation פ

וַיְדַבֵּ֣ר <S%H1696><s%> spake יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מֹשֶׁ֥ה <S%H4872><s%> unto Moses וְאֶֽל־ <S%H413><s%> and אַהֲרֹ֖ן <S%H175><s%> and unto Aaron לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> saying

הִבָּ֣דְל֔וּ <S%H914><s%> Separate מִתּ֖וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> yourselves from among הָעֵדָ֣ה <S%H5712><s%> this congregation הַזֹּ֑את <S%H2063><s%> I וַאַכַלֶּ֥ה <S%H3615><s%> that I may consume אֹתָ֖ם <S%H853><s%> כְּרָֽגַע׃ <S%H7281><s%> them in a moment

וַיִּפְּל֤וּ <S%H5307><s%> And they fell עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on פְּנֵיהֶם֙ <S%H6440><s%> upon their faces וַיֹּ֣אמְר֔וּ <S%H559><s%> and said אֵ֕ל <S%H410><s%> O God אֱלֹהֵ֥י <S%H430><s%> the God הָרוּחֹ֖ת <S%H7307><s%> of the spirits לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> of all בָּשָׂ֑ר <S%H1320><s%> of all flesh הָאִ֤ישׁ <S%H376><s%> man אֶחָד֙ <S%H259><s%> shall one יֶחֱטָ֔א <S%H2398><s%> sin וְעַ֥ל <S%H5921><s%> with כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> the entire הָעֵדָ֖ה <S%H5712><s%> assembly תִּקְצֹֽף׃ <S%H7107><s%> and wilt thou be wroth פ
וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> spake יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מֹשֶׁ֥ה <S%H4872><s%> unto Moses לֵּאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> saying

דַּבֵּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> Speak אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הָעֵדָ֖ה <S%H5712><s%> unto the congregation לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> saying הֵֽעָלוּ֙ <S%H5927><s%> Get you up מִסָּבִ֔יב <S%H5439><s%> from about לְמִשְׁכַּן־ <S%H4908><s%> the tabernacle קֹ֖רַח <S%H7141><s%> of Korah דָּתָ֥ן <S%H1885><s%> Dathan וַאֲבִירָֽם׃ <S%H48><s%> and Abiram

וַיָּ֣קָם <S%H6965><s%> rose up מֹשֶׁ֔ה <S%H4872><s%> And Moses וַיֵּ֖לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> and went אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to דָּתָ֣ן <S%H1885><s%> unto Dathan וַאֲבִירָ֑ם <S%H48><s%> and Abiram וַיֵּלְכ֥וּ <S%H1980><s%> and went אַחֲרָ֖יו <S%H310><s%> him זִקְנֵ֥י <S%H2205><s%> and the elders יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel

וַיְדַבֵּ֨ר <S%H1696><s%> And he spake אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הָעֵדָ֜ה <S%H5712><s%> unto the congregation לֵאמֹ֗ר <S%H559><s%> saying ס֣וּרוּ <S%H5493><s%> Depart נָ֡א <S%H4994><s%> now מֵעַל֩ <S%H5921><s%> from אָהֳלֵ֨י <S%H168><s%> I pray you from the tents הָאֲנָשִׁ֤ים <S%H376><s%> men הָֽרְשָׁעִים֙ <S%H7563><s%> of these wicked הָאֵ֔לֶּה <S%H428><s%> of these וְאַֽל־ <S%H408><s%> nay תִּגְּע֖וּ <S%H5060><s%> and touch בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> after לָהֶ֑ם פֶּן־ <S%H6435><s%> or תִּסָּפ֖וּ <S%H5595><s%> nothing of theirs lest ye be consumed בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all חַטֹּאתָֽם׃ <S%H2403><s%> in all their sins

וַיֵּעָל֗וּ <S%H5927><s%> So they gat up מֵעַ֧ל <S%H5921><s%> and מִשְׁכַּן־ <S%H4908><s%> from the tabernacle קֹ֛רֶח <S%H7141><s%> of Korah דָּתָ֥ן <S%H1885><s%> Dathan וַאֲבִירָ֖ם <S%H48><s%> and Abiram מִסָּבִ֑יב <S%H5439><s%> on every side וְדָתָ֨ן <S%H1885><s%> and Dathan וַאֲבִירָ֜ם <S%H48><s%> and Abiram יָצְא֣וּ <S%H3318><s%> came out נִצָּבִ֗ים <S%H5324><s%> and stood פֶּ֚תַח <S%H6607><s%> in the door אָֽהֳלֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H168><s%> of their tents וּנְשֵׁיהֶ֥ם <S%H802><s%> and their wives וּבְנֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H1121><s%> and their sons וְטַפָּֽם׃ <S%H2945><s%> and their little children

וַיֹּאמֶר֮ <S%H559><s%> said מֹשֶׁה֒ <S%H4872><s%> And Moses בְּזֹאת֙ <S%H2063><s%> you תֵּֽדְע֔וּן <S%H3045><s%> Hereby ye shall know כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> that יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> that the LORD שְׁלָחַ֔נִי <S%H7971><s%> hath sent לַעֲשׂ֕וֹת <S%H6213><s%> me to do אֵ֥ת <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַֽמַּעֲשִׂ֖ים <S%H4639><s%> all these works הָאֵ֑לֶּה <S%H428><s%> these כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> for לֹ֖א <S%H3808><s%> own מִלִּבִּֽי׃ <S%H3820><s%> for [I have] not [done them] of mine own mind

אִם־ <S%H518><s%> If כְּמ֤וֹת <S%H4194><s%> the common death כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> of all הָֽאָדָם֙ <S%H120><s%> of all men יְמֻת֣וּן <S%H4191><s%> If these men die אֵ֔לֶּה <S%H428><s%> these וּפְקֻדַּת֙ <S%H6486><s%> after the visitation כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> of all הָ֣אָדָ֔ם <S%H120><s%> of all men יִפָּקֵ֖ד <S%H6485><s%> or if they be visited עֲלֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H5921><s%> and לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> [then] the LORD שְׁלָחָֽנִי׃ <S%H7971><s%> hath not sent

וְאִם־ <S%H518><s%> if בְּרִיאָ֞ה <S%H1278><s%> a new thing יִבְרָ֣א <S%H1254><s%> make יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> But if the LORD וּפָצְתָ֨ה <S%H6475><s%> open הָאֲדָמָ֤ה <S%H127><s%> and the earth אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> פִּ֙יהָ֙ <S%H6310><s%> her mouth וּבָלְעָ֤ה <S%H1104><s%> and swallow them up אֹתָם֙ <S%H853><s%> וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> after לָהֶ֔ם וְיָרְד֥וּ <S%H3381><s%> with all that [appertain] unto them and they go down חַיִּ֖ים <S%H2416><s%> quick שְׁאֹ֑לָה <S%H7585><s%> into the pit וִֽידַעְתֶּ֕ם <S%H3045><s%> then ye shall understand כִּ֧י <S%H3588><s%> for נִֽאֲצ֛וּ <S%H5006><s%> have provoked הָאֲנָשִׁ֥ים <S%H376><s%> men הָאֵ֖לֶּה <S%H428><s%> these אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD

וַיְהִי֙ <S%H1961><s%> become כְּכַלֹּת֔וֹ <S%H3615><s%> And it came to pass as he had made an end לְדַבֵּ֕ר <S%H1696><s%> of speaking אֵ֥ת <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַדְּבָרִ֖ים <S%H1697><s%> all these words הָאֵ֑לֶּה <S%H428><s%> these וַתִּבָּקַ֥ע <S%H1234><s%> clave asunder הָאֲדָמָ֖ה <S%H127><s%> that the ground אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> that was תַּחְתֵּיהֶֽם׃ <S%H8478><s%> under

וַתִּפְתַּ֤ח <S%H6605><s%> opened הָאָ֙רֶץ֙ <S%H776><s%> And the earth אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> פִּ֔יהָ <S%H6310><s%> her mouth וַתִּבְלַ֥ע <S%H1104><s%> and swallowed them up אֹתָ֖ם <S%H853><s%> וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בָּתֵּיהֶ֑ם <S%H1004><s%> and their houses וְאֵ֤ת <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all הָאָדָם֙ <S%H120><s%> and all the men אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> who לְקֹ֔רַח <S%H7141><s%> that [appertained] unto Korah וְאֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all הָרֲכֽוּשׁ׃ <S%H7399><s%> and all [their] goods

וַיֵּ֨רְד֜וּ <S%H3381><s%> They and all that [appertained] to them went down הֵ֣ם <S%H1992><s%> they וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> after לָהֶ֛ם חַיִּ֖ים <S%H2416><s%> alive שְׁאֹ֑לָה <S%H7585><s%> into the pit וַתְּכַ֤ס <S%H3680><s%> closed עֲלֵיהֶם֙ <S%H5921><s%> over הָאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> and the earth וַיֹּאבְד֖וּ <S%H6><s%> upon them and they perished מִתּ֥וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> from among הַקָּהָֽל׃ <S%H6951><s%> the congregation

וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> All יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <S%H3478><s%> And all Israel אֲשֶׁ֛ר <S%H834><s%> who סְבִיבֹתֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H5439><s%> that [were] round about נָ֣סוּ <S%H5127><s%> them fled לְקֹלָ֑ם <S%H6963><s%> at the cry כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for אָֽמְר֔וּ <S%H559><s%> of them for they said פֶּן־ <S%H6435><s%> lest תִּבְלָעֵ֖נוּ <S%H1104><s%> swallow us up הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> Lest the earth

וְאֵ֥שׁ <S%H784><s%> a fire יָצְאָ֖ה <S%H3318><s%> And there came out מֵאֵ֣ת <S%H853><s%> יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> from the LORD וַתֹּ֗אכַל <S%H398><s%> and consumed אֵ֣ת <S%H853><s%> הַחֲמִשִּׁ֤ים <S%H2572><s%> and fifty וּמָאתַ֙יִם֙ <S%H3967><s%> the two hundred אִ֔ישׁ <S%H376><s%> men מַקְרִיבֵ֖י <S%H7126><s%> that offered הַקְּטֹֽרֶת׃ <S%H7004><s%> incense פ
וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> spake יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מֹשֶׁ֥ה <S%H4872><s%> unto Moses לֵּאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> saying

אֱמֹ֨ר <S%H559><s%> Speak אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to אֶלְעָזָ֜ר <S%H499><s%> unto Eleazar בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son אַהֲרֹ֣ן <S%H175><s%> of Aaron הַכֹּהֵ֗ן <S%H3548><s%> the priest וְיָרֵ֤ם <S%H7311><s%> that he take up אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַמַּחְתֹּת֙ <S%H4289><s%> the censers מִבֵּ֣ין <S%H996><s%> out הַשְּׂרֵפָ֔ה <S%H8316><s%> of the burning וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאֵ֖שׁ <S%H784><s%> thou the fire זְרֵה־ <S%H2219><s%> and scatter הָ֑לְאָה <S%H1973><s%> yonder כִּ֖י <S%H3588><s%> for קָדֵֽשׁוּ׃ <S%H6942><s%> for they are hallowed

אֵ֡ת <S%H853><s%> מַחְתּוֹת֩ <S%H4289><s%> The censers הַֽחַטָּאִ֨ים <S%H2400><s%> of these sinners הָאֵ֜לֶּה <S%H428><s%> of these בְּנַפְשֹׁתָ֗ם <S%H5315><s%> against their own souls וְעָשׂ֨וּ <S%H6213><s%> let them make אֹתָ֜ם <S%H853><s%> רִקֻּעֵ֤י <S%H7555><s%> them broad פַחִים֙ <S%H6341><s%> plates צִפּ֣וּי <S%H6826><s%> [for] a covering לַמִּזְבֵּ֔חַ <S%H4196><s%> of the altar כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> since הִקְרִיבֻ֥ם <S%H7126><s%> for they offered לִפְנֵֽי־ <S%H6440><s%> them before יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD וַיִּקְדָּ֑שׁוּ <S%H6942><s%> therefore they are hallowed וְיִֽהְי֥וּ <S%H1961><s%> shall be for לְא֖וֹת <S%H226><s%> and they shall be a sign לִבְנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> unto the children יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel

וַיִּקַּ֞ח <S%H3947><s%> took אֶלְעָזָ֣ר <S%H499><s%> And Eleazar הַכֹּהֵ֗ן <S%H3548><s%> the priest אֵ֚ת <S%H853><s%> מַחְתּ֣וֹת <S%H4289><s%> censers הַנְּחֹ֔שֶׁת <S%H5178><s%> the brasen אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which הִקְרִ֖יבוּ <S%H7126><s%> had offered הַשְּׂרֻפִ֑ים <S%H8313><s%> wherewith they that were burnt וַֽיְרַקְּע֖וּם <S%H7554><s%> and they were made broad צִפּ֥וּי <S%H6826><s%> [plates for] a covering לַמִּזְבֵּֽחַ׃ <S%H4196><s%> of the altar

זִכָּר֞וֹן <S%H2146><s%> [To be] a memorial לִבְנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> unto the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel לְ֠מַעַן <S%H4616><s%> because of אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> who לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> no יִקְרַ֜ב <S%H7126><s%> come near אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> he זָ֗ר <S%H2114><s%> layman אֲ֠שֶׁר <S%H834><s%> who לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> no מִזֶּ֤רַע <S%H2233><s%> which [is] not of the seed אַהֲרֹן֙ <S%H175><s%> of Aaron ה֔וּא <S%H1931><s%> he לְהַקְטִ֥יר <S%H6999><s%> to offer קְטֹ֖רֶת <S%H7004><s%> incense לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> before יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> no יִהְיֶ֤ה <S%H1961><s%> become כְקֹ֙רַח֙ <S%H7141><s%> that he be not as Korah וְכַ֣עֲדָת֔וֹ <S%H5712><s%> and as his company כַּאֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> who דִּבֶּ֧ר <S%H1696><s%> said יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> as the LORD בְּיַד־ <S%H3027><s%> to him by the hand מֹשֶׁ֖ה <S%H4872><s%> of Moses לֽוֹ׃

וַיִּלֹּ֜נוּ <S%H3885><s%> murmured כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all עֲדַ֤ת <S%H5712><s%> all the congregation בְּנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel מִֽמָּחֳרָ֔ת <S%H4283><s%> But on the morrow עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> against מֹשֶׁ֥ה <S%H4872><s%> against Moses וְעַֽל־ <S%H5921><s%> against אַהֲרֹ֖ן <S%H175><s%> and against Aaron לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> saying אַתֶּ֥ם <S%H859><s%> who הֲמִתֶּ֖ם <S%H4191><s%> Ye have killed אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עַ֥ם <S%H5971><s%> the people יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD

וַיְהִ֗י <S%H1961><s%> came בְּהִקָּהֵ֤ל <S%H6950><s%> was gathered הָֽעֵדָה֙ <S%H5712><s%> And it came to pass when the congregation עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> against מֹשֶׁ֣ה <S%H4872><s%> against Moses וְעַֽל־ <S%H5921><s%> against אַהֲרֹ֔ן <S%H175><s%> and against Aaron וַיִּפְנוּ֙ <S%H6437><s%> that they looked אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> toward אֹ֣הֶל <S%H168><s%> toward the tabernacle מוֹעֵ֔ד <S%H4150><s%> of the congregation וְהִנֵּ֥ה <S%H2009><s%> and behold כִסָּ֖הוּ <S%H3680><s%> covered הֶעָנָ֑ן <S%H6051><s%> and behold the cloud וַיֵּרָ֖א <S%H7200><s%> appeared כְּב֥וֹד <S%H3519><s%> it and the glory יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD

וַיָּבֹ֤א <S%H935><s%> came מֹשֶׁה֙ <S%H4872><s%> And Moses וְאַהֲרֹ֔ן <S%H175><s%> and Aaron אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to פְּנֵ֖י <S%H6440><s%> before אֹ֥הֶל <S%H168><s%> the tabernacle מוֹעֵֽד׃ <S%H4150><s%> of the congregation פ
וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> spake יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מֹשֶׁ֥ה <S%H4872><s%> unto Moses לֵּאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> saying

הֵרֹ֗מּוּ <S%H7426><s%> Get you up מִתּוֹךְ֙ <S%H8432><s%> from among הָעֵדָ֣ה <S%H5712><s%> this congregation הַזֹּ֔את <S%H2063><s%> I וַאֲכַלֶּ֥ה <S%H3615><s%> that I may consume אֹתָ֖ם <S%H853><s%> כְּרָ֑גַע <S%H7281><s%> them as in a moment וַֽיִּפְּל֖וּ <S%H5307><s%> And they fell עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on פְּנֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H6440><s%> upon their faces

וַיַּעֲמֹ֥ד <S%H5975><s%> And he stood בֵּֽין־ <S%H996><s%> between הַמֵּתִ֖ים <S%H4191><s%> between the dead וּבֵ֣ין <S%H996><s%> between הַֽחַיִּ֑ים <S%H2416><s%> and the living וַתֵּעָצַ֖ר <S%H6113><s%> was stayed הַמַּגֵּפָֽה׃ <S%H4046><s%> and the plague
